channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Custom JavaScript and CSS
item.description: With custom CSS and JavaScript you can change pretty much anything in heyo appearance or functionality, and it’s pretty simple, too!

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Sketches!
item.description: Sketches are the pretty visualizations in heyo’s sidebar. The default ones were built using p5.js – a javascript library for creative coding.

item.title: Sketches!
item.description: Sketches são as visualizações na barra lateral do heyo. As disponíveis no momento foram construídas usando p5.js – uma biblioteca de javascript para programação criativa.

item.title: Post Thumbnail
item.description: You can now add thumbnails to your posts in heyo!

item.title: Thumbnail no post
item.description: Agora você pode adicionar thumbnails no seu post!

item.title: Índice
item.description: No heyo podemos usar a barra da esquerda para mostrar um índice do post!

item.title: Table of Contents
item.description: In heyo we can use the sidebar to display a Table of Contents!

item.title: Rendering Math Stuff
item.description: This article shows how to configure your site with heyo theme to display $\LaTeX$.

item.title: Renderizando Matemática
item.description: Esse artigo mostra como configurar seu site com o heyo para mostrar matemática formatada com $\LaTeX$.

item.title: About
item.description: heyo is a responsive, minimalist, and pretty theme built for hugo, based on Alexander Bilz’s Anatole. Features Cover images Pretty visualizations in the sidebar Table of Contents in the sidebar Callout shortcode Badges shortcode Dark theme Support for custom CSS and JS Multilingual support (english and brazilian portuguese, for now) Open Graph support Soon™ Quickstart To try the exampleSite you just need to: git clone https://github.com/LucasVadilho/heyo-hugo-theme heyo cd heyo/exampleSite && hugo server --themesDir .

item.title: Badges
item.description: This article will show you how to add and customize badges in your posts.

item.title: Insígnias
item.description: Esse artigo mostra como adicionar e customizar insígnias (badges) em seus posts.

item.title: Sobre
item.description: heyo é um tema responsivo, minimalista e bonito para hugo. Ele foi baseado no Anatole de Alexander Bilz. Features Imagens de capa Visualizações in the sidebar Índices in the sidebar Callout shortcode Badges shortcode Tema escuro Suporte para CSS e JS customizados Suporte para Multilinguas (inglês e pt-br, por enquanto) Open Graph support Soon™ Quickstart Para testar o exampleSite é só: git clone https://github.com/LucasVadilho/heyo-hugo-theme heyo cd heyo/exampleSite && hugo server --themesDir .
